text:
It seems that the security bug (reported on bulletin on 17-June-2002) that was 
solved in 1.3.26 does NOT solve the problem for Tru64 unix. Can you confirm or 
deny that it was tested on Tru64 unix 4.0d and higher and 5.1?

Thanks,
Jeff
creator: jeff@exlibris.co.il

text:
How did you verify that the problem is not resolved with 1.3.26?  We've done a 
number of before/after tests on a number of other platforms.  Just now I built
1.3.26 on Tru64 5.1 and get the expected behavior (Apache returns error 400
to browser) when I try to exploit the overflow condition in the old code.
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
MY client installed an advanced version of scanning software which shows the 
apache 1.3.26 is secure. Sorry for the hastle. case closed.

Thanks,
Jeff
creator: jeff@exlibris.co.il
